subject: JUnit  and JUnitReport Tasks in ANT
msgSnippet: I have been working with a simple example of these tasks in JUnit testing out the XML reporting ability.  I m a little fuzzy on what JUnitReport actually
messageBody:
I have been working with a simple example of these tasks in JUnit
testing out the XML reporting ability. I'm a little fuzzy on what
JUnitReport actually produces, because thusfar, it has produced
nothing of significance besides grouping together the info of the
individual xml files into 1 xml file.

The big problem I'm having is this error that is being thrown. Below
is the stacktrace with the build.xml file that created it.

[dump]
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/xml/sax/ext/LexicalHandler
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass0(Native Method)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(ClassLoader.java:486)
at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass
(SecureClassLoader.java:11
1)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass
(URLClassLoader.java:248)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$100(URLClassLoader.java:56)
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:195)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:297)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass
(Launcher.java:286)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:253)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal
(ClassLoader.java:313)
at
org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.AggregateTransformer.tra
nsform(AggregateTransformer.java:452)
at
org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.AggregateTransformer.cre
atePackageList(AggregateTransformer.java:310)
at
org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.AggregateTransformer.tra
nsform(AggregateTransformer.java:233)
at
org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.XMLResultAggregator.exec
ute(XMLResultAggregator.java:169)
at org.apache.tools.ant.Target.execute(Target.java:153)
at org.apache.tools.ant.Project.runTarget(Project.java:898)
at org.apache.tools.ant.Project.executeTarget
(Project.java:536)
at org.apache.tools.ant.Project.executeTargets
(Project.java:510)
at org.apache.tools.ant.Main.runBuild(Main.java:421)
at org.apache.tools.ant.Main.main(Main.java:149)
[file]
<project name="MyProject" default="combine" basedir=".">

<property name="src" value="."/>
<property name="build.tests" value="test"/>
<property name="reports.tests" value="reports"/>

<target name="junit">
<junit printsummary="yes" haltonfailure="no">
<classpath>
<pathelement location="${src}" />
<pathelement
location="${build.tests}" />
<pathelement
path="${java.class.path}" />
</classpath>
<formatter type="xml" />

<batchtest fork="yes"
todir="${reports.tests}">
<fileset dir="${build.tests}">
<include
name="**/*Test.java" />
</fileset>
</batchtest>
</junit>
</target>
<target name="combine" depends="junit">
<junitreport todir="${reports.tests}">
<fileset dir="${reports.tests}">
<include name="TEST-*.xml"/>
</fileset>
<report format="frames"
todir="${reports.tests}/html"/>
</junitreport>
</target>
</project>
